definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Octagon —shapedturrets rest on the four corners of the wall.
sentences.chinese: 八角形塔樓其餘的四個角落的牆上。

sentences.english: A pair of guards dragged a prisoner in through the tower's stone doorway.
sentences.chinese: 兩個守衛把一個囚犯拖進來，穿過塔樓的石梯入口。

sentences.english: The atlantes and caryatids also appear to evolve towards the uppermost floors of the towers.
sentences.chinese: 這些男像柱和女像柱都朝向塔樓最高的樓層。

sentences.english: I'm sure there's no other tower like this one in the world.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定世界上再沒有第二座像這樣的塔樓了。

sentences.english: The turrets you have equipped are shown on screen and they look amazing.
sentences.chinese: 你裝備的塔樓顯示在屏幕上，他們看起來非常妙。

sentences.english: The wind before the storm fills the mountainside tower.
sentences.chinese: 暴雨前的風灌滿了山腰上的塔樓。

sentences.english: The two tower buildings of the World Trade Center have disappeared from the map of New York.
sentences.chinese: 世界貿易中心的兩座塔樓已從紐約的地圖上消失了。

sentences.english: He looked around and found a tall tower in the south.
sentences.chinese: 他四下看了看，發現南邊有一座高高的塔樓。

sentences.english: That would make the high towers in the range of a20+ floor high common building.
sentences.chinese: 這就是說高塔樓都在普通樓房的20層以上。

sentences.english: The wind that blows the dry steppe dust. Stirs the curtains in your tower.
sentences.chinese: 大風捲襲着草原的塵土，掀起塔樓上的窗簾。

sentences.english: The main tower of the Yintai Center is a super high rise steel structure building.
sentences.chinese: 銀泰中心主塔樓爲一超高層鋼結構建築。

sentences.english: Tower One is already under construction.
sentences.chinese: 一號塔樓已經在建造中。

sentences.english: Since then, whenever I have had the opportunity, I have gone to the top of the tower and enjoyed myself.
sentences.chinese: 從此一有機會，我就上到塔樓頂上去自得其樂。

sentences.english: They are setting up a20- story tower building up the street.
sentences.chinese: 他們正在街邊建起一棟20層的塔樓。

sentences.english: The clock in the tower strikes at noon.
sentences.chinese: 中午的時候在塔樓裏面的時鐘敲打着。

definition: Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
tenement building, typically of 2-4 stories, with a shop on the ground floor and upper floors used for residential purposes (esp. in southern China)
Tsing Ma Bridge (to Hong Kong Airport)
